title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When creating a new "DateTime" type report parameter in BIRT report designer, if an invalid date string is entered in the "default value" field, such as "55/66/9999", the invalid value is accepted and stored incorrectly in the report design. The report design XML should have stored a dateTime type constant using the XML schema date/time format (yyyymmddThh:mm:ss) to ensure portability.
EB: Additionally, the UI or model should have validated the entered date value to prevent accepting invalid formats.
